A project team needs to follow regulatory compliance guidelines that are mandatory for the project. What should the project manager do to ensure compliance adherence?

choices.C: Include compliance within the development tools.
choices.D: Assess compliance when there is time in the project.
choices.A: Review compliance adherence at the end of the project.
choices.B: Assign a project team member to ensure compliance.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The best answer is:
B. Assign a project team member to ensure compliance.

Compliance is critical and mandatory, so a dedicated person should be responsible for monitoring and enforcing adherence throughout the project.

This ensures early detection of non-compliance issues and allows proactive corrective actions.
The assigned team member can also track regulatory updates, conduct audits, and ensure documentation is properly maintained.
